title: Nikita Antipov
text:
Nikita Olegovich Antipov (; born 5 August 1997) is a Russian <a href="association%20football">football</a> player. He plays for <a href="FC%20Kaluga">FC Kaluga</a>.
Club career.
He made his debut in the <a href="Russian%20Football%20National%20League">Russian Football National League</a> for <a href="FC%20Irtysh%20Omsk">FC Irtysh Omsk</a> on 1 August 2020 in a game against <a href="FC%20Yenisey%20Krasnoyarsk">FC Yenisey Krasnoyarsk</a>, he substituted <a href="Stanislav%20Mareyev">Stanislav Mareyev</a> in the 90th minute.
